title: Retry application deployment

requirements.text: Retry deploying the current application build (frontend + backend) without introducing any new feature changes, and confirm the deployment completes successfully.

quotes: Assistant: Got it â€” retrying the deployment.

acceptanceCriteria: A deployment attempt is executed for the current app revision (same code as last attempted deploy).
The deployment completes successfully with no build or deploy errors.
The deployed frontend loads and can reach the backend canister without runtime errors.
If deployment fails again, capture and surface the full error output (build logs and deploy logs) so it can be used to create a follow-up fix request.

constraints: Do not implement new backend or frontend features as part of this deployment retry.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Changing the backend admin system (e.g., granting principals, persisting admin list across upgrades).
Updating any frontend admin diagnostics UI behavior.
